author: jgm
content:
The thing that I see with Ethereum is that it has a roadmap.  Lots of chains take one of the features from the roadmap, launch clean, and call themselves Ethereum killers.  But they have no answers for all of the other pieces in the roadmap, and no ability to carry out the very tricky process of upgrading a live chain.

As <@!301186049323958275> says, if a chain launches with _all_ of the proposed Ethereum features, or even a majority, I'd be interested, but to date nothing appears to be even attempting to do so.
